channel.title: Paradise X2 Client- Can't find where to change IP
channel.description:
I am having a very hard time locating the place where you change the ip. I think it is in the gui, but I don't know where. Only I can connect.
All other clients weren't a problem changing.

item.title: Paradise X2 Client- Can't find where to change IP
item.dc:creator: @Alphaspida Alphaspida
item.description:
@Alphaspida wrote:

Everything is set. nothing

Read full topic

item.title: Paradise X2 Client- Can't find where to change IP
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

search setserver or serverip in either GUI.java or client.java, and an ip should be there…

Read full topic
item.source: Paradise X2 Client- Can't find where to change IP

item.title: Paradise X2 Client- Can't find where to change IP
item.dc:creator: @Alphaspida Alphaspida
item.description:
@Alphaspida wrote:

Thank you for replying, but I have pretty much changed everything that has to do with the server ip. Maybe the person testing it just cant connect? I can connect. Should I get another person to try it?

Note: Nothing in client.java or gui.java says 0.0.0.0, 127.0.0.1 or localhost (where the server ip is suppose to be). I also can’t find any other server ip.

Read full topic
item.source: Paradise X2 Client- Can't find where to change IP

item.title: Paradise X2 Client- Can't find where to change IP
item.dc:creator: @DesiDre DesiDre
item.description:
@DesiDre wrote:

go into your gui or client.java and find 127.0.0.1 or search no-ip.

Untill you find something similar to a server ip. change it to either localhost 127.0.0.1 or your server ip.

Read full topic
